phrases: We need all three of us!
Jugyou no ato de Sensei ni Bye Bye!
Say Bye Bye to the teacher after school!
Get my P.E uniform and go home!
Want To play in the school yard?
Demo demo datte iiwake shinai no
But but I will not make any excuses
Take turns on clean-up every week
Let us run a few rounds.
mitsu dara dete nijuukai mo yaru!
If it is us three, then we can even do twenty!
Drop down low and round you go!
Tanoshii de mainichi ookiku nare ba
If you have fun and grow up everyday.
I want to know, I do not know, I want to know!
Tanoshii de mainichi chiisai na koto de!
Enjoy all the little things everyday.
warai aidara sore wa sore de ureshii
Just seeing a smile makes me happy!
sore mou kore mou dore mou
Like this one, that one, and that one too!
Then it is the same whether it is three or five!
I have finally become a teacher at a Primary School.
I am Yabe Satoshi and I am new here.
I look forward to working with everyone.
I am the Infirmary nurse, Kuriyama Aiko.
The Class I am in charge of is Year 6-3
I cannot wait to see what kind of children are in my class!
Good Girl, Bad Girl, Scary Girl!!
That is right, we just have to kill before we get killed..
There is no end to them...
This..is not supposed to be a war..
Oh..so it is not this kind of game!?
Nandemo Basuketto is a game where you form a circle using enough chairs for all players, except for one.
The person without a chair is it, he or she stands in the middle of the circle..
picks a theme, then everyone with that theme gets up and change chairs.
The next person that gets left without a chair is the next it.
When someone says Nandemo Basuketto, everyone has to change chairs.
Anyone that becomes it for three times gets a punishment!
By the way..the punishment this time is three times the homework!
It was just a game to start off the class with and it ended up like this..
But it is still too early to be surprised..
I tried to show my good side to you, but I got carried away!
I am always living life to the fullest!!
There is no need to kneel on the ground...but she sure is an honest kid..
You are supposed to kneel like..
What the hell are you doing?!
there is supposed to be another one..
Hey you..do not just sit out!!
In this class, there is three super-problem-childs..
Do not get up so suddenly!!
Marui Futaba (Second Daughter) Kind Of-Perverted Muscle-Girl)
Are not you guys supposed to be in reflection?!
I am now reflecting on the color of her panties!
Guess you should not let your guard down..
I am sure I put the right number of chairs..
Do not sit on your classmates!!!
He should be grateful that I let him be my seat..
Marui Mitsuba (First Daughter) Kind Of Precocious Sadistic-Girl)
Even if he is grateful, you cannot!!!
In a game, there is only winners and ME!!
Marui Hitoha (Third Daughter) Kind Of Mysterious Gloomy-Girl)
Well..what are you going to choose!
Why are you guys getting so serious?!
and You could be a little more serious!!
Look there is a pair of boobies outside!
I am going to show my dignity as a teacher!!
Why am I doing the homework?
Am I really going to be okay as a teacher?!
Be more like a homeroom teacher!
You sure are getting along well with your students!
Hmm Can we do something to get them together?
Haa...a guy that is been living a sad life..that is what.
In that case..let us get Yabe-cchi to have a taste of that sweet nectar.
You are useless...hey, Hitoha..you think of something too!
She is got a bright idea!
I got hit between the legs!!
We have to treat it quickly!
It is love bound at the crotch is not it!!
What kind of love is that?!
What are you girls talking about?
But this time I will get it for sure!
I am aiming for his crotch for the sake of his romance!
If YOU aim for it, there is going to be nothing left there!
Well that is alright too, but if I do it gently it will be fine!!
You are not convincing anyone here...
Wait..now's not the time for this!
I am the only one who is this reliable and cute!!
Besides..if you aim for a spot like that..
What the hell are you guys doing???!
Why are you guys aiming for my crotch?!
We are going to follow him!!
Why is my crotch being targeted?!
That is what you get for being an insolent dog!!
It is all for your romance!
Hurry up and take it off...
Class 6-3 decided to look after a hamster.
Well actually I was the one who bought it for them.
It would be nice if the children could learn the value of life and the joy of looking after something.
I want to SQUISH him and SQUASH him into goo!!
Hitoha-chan, You seem to like him alot.
Well then, maybe Hitoha-chan can be in charge of taking care of him.
He does not have one yet.
If you close your eyes and touch him around his tail, it kind of feels like a nipple!
You are imagination is abit too good!!
I think she likes that name.
From that moment on, Hitoha-chan thoroughly cared for the hamster.
It feels as thought her gloomy aura has dissolved a little.
He is not eating much and stays in his house all the time...
Hmm..maybe it is the change of surroundings and perhaps you guys are petting him too much.
Do not worry about it too much, he will get bette...
It is not like it is your fault Hitoha-chan..
It is Mit-chan that has been stressing him out!
It is alright, he will get better soon!
(Maybe put well , but'good' is like kind of a joke?
We are just checking on him!
I guess the third daughter is actually the strongest..
Hurry up and turn the page, Hitoha!!
Hehh..your class is taking care of a hamster..
Well, I bought it for them...
Well..what is wrong, anything you want to tell me?
(Board: I will look after Nipples at my house)
That was just a mis-understanding right..I have to apologise to Yabe-sensei..
I want to touch (your) nipples more!
You are kidding, do not just hog him!
We all want to touch nipples!
I want to see more nipples too!!
Well, (your) nipples are not feeling too well recently..
It is because everyone keeps stroking it and pinching it too hard!
It is all because you guys have been toying with my Nipples as you wish!
I want to see it grow bigger!!
But everytime you gently stroke Nipples, it seems to feel so comfortable!
Why do not you let everyone take turns looking after nipples?
Hitoha-chan, try have a little more faith in everyone!
That is right, let me have a turn at your nipples!
Everyone is going to protect your Nipples!!
Everyone likes Nipples as much as you do.
Of course, I like them too!
The sunset reflected on the schoolgrounds.
te wo futte ie ni kaeru
Let us hold hands and go home.
bedo no naka de mata konya
kyou no kimi ni aitetara ii na
It would be nice if I could meet you again.
kimi to te wo tsunai de
Even though it is only a dream
